title: Drawing, "Cover Design:  L'Illustration, Noël, 1931", 1931
medium: Brush and gouache, watercolor, black ink, gold paint, graphite on heavy cream wover paper
signed: Signed in pen and black ink, brush and gold paint, lower right corner:  SIMON LISSIM 31
inscribed: Inscribed in brush and black ink and white gouache, across center:  L'ILLUSTRATION/NOËL 1931
description: Cover in the form of stage design with elaborate abstract floral andleaf pattern around edges within which is a curtain held open by two male figures dressed as knights in armor with shields and ?

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Cover Design:  L'Illustration, Noël, 1931", 1931. Brush and gouache, watercolor, black ink, gold paint, graphite on heavy cream wover paper. 1985-81-4.
